SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class TUI extends Object implements UserInterface
The TUI class provides all methods needed for a Textual User Interface It implements UserInterface
